verses.text: Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pass|strong="H7725"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w if|strong="H0176"\w* thou seest thy \w brother’s|strong="H0251"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w* \w go|strong="H7725"\w* \w astray|strong="H5080"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* thou shalt \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* nigh, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* thou \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: thou shalt \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee \w until|strong="H5704"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w receive|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

Thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w manner|strong="H3651"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* ass, \w and|strong="H0251"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* raiment, \w and|strong="H0251"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* thy \w brother’s|strong="H0251"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w lost|strong="H0006"\w*: \w if|strong="H0834"\w* thou \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w*, \w neglect|strong="H5956"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* pertaining \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w another|strong="H0251"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0176"\w* thou \w see|strong="H7200"\w* thy \w brother’s|strong="H0251"\w* ass \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* slight \w it|strong="H7200"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* shalt \w lift|strong="H6965"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w A|strong="H1961"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w man’s|strong="H1397"\w* \w apparel|strong="H3847"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w use|strong="H1961"\w* \w woman’s|strong="H0802"\w* \w apparel|strong="H3847"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* doeth \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w abominable|strong="H8441"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w find|strong="H3947"\w* \w as|strong="H1121"\w* thou walkest \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w bird’s|strong="H6833"\w* \w nest|strong="H7064"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dam \w sitting|strong="H7257"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w eggs|strong="H1000"\w*: thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3947"\w* shalt \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, keeping \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* which thou hast \w caught|strong="H3947"\w*: \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w well|strong="H3190"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou mayst \w live|strong="H0748"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* thou buildest \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, thou shalt \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* battlement \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w roof|strong="H1406"\w* round \w about|strong="H4480"\w*: lest \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w shed|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* thou \w be|strong="H3808"\w* guilty, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* slip, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w* headlong.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* thy \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* \w with|strong="H3754"\w* divers \w seeds|strong="H2233"\w*: \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* both \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w sown|strong="H2232"\w*, \w and|strong="H3754"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* fruit \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* together.
Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* plough with an \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \w and|strong="H7794"\w* an ass \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w wear|strong="H3847"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* garment \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3808"\w* woven \w of|strong="H3808"\w* woollen \w and|strong="H6785"\w* \w linen|strong="H6593"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

Thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* strings \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* hem \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H3671"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* thy cloak, wherewith thou shalt be \w covered|strong="H3680"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w marry|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* afterwards \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0802"\w* \w seek|strong="H3808"\w* occasions \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w*, laying \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w charge|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* very ill \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w going|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*, \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1331"\w*:

\w Her|strong="H0413"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w shall|strong="H0517"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w shall|strong="H0517"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tokens \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w virginity|strong="H1331"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w that|strong="H0001"\w* \w are|strong="H8179"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* unto \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w because|strong="H0413"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* hateth \w her|strong="H0413"\w*,

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* layeth \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H0559"\w* \w charge|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* very ill \w name|strong="H0559"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1331"\w*: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* tokens \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w daughter’s|strong="H1323"\w* \w virginity|strong="H1331"\w*. \w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w cloth|strong="H8071"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* beat \w him|strong="H0853"\w*,

Condemning \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w besides|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* sides \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w which|strong="H0802"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* damsel’s \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath defamed \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* very ill \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* charged \w her|strong="H0518"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w true|strong="H0571"\w*, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w virginity|strong="H1331"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* damsel:

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w cast|strong="H5619"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w doors|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w thing|strong="H5039"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w play|strong="H2181"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* whore \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* thou shalt \w take|strong="H3318"\w* \w away|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* thee.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w another|strong="H0376"\w* \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* adulterer \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* adulteress: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* thou shalt \w take|strong="H5973"\w* \w away|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w out|strong="H4672"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* espoused \w a|strong="H1961"\w* damsel \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w some|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w her|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w her|strong="H1961"\w*,

Thou shalt \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w stoned|strong="H5619"\w*: \w the|strong="H0853"\w* damsel, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, being \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath humbled \w his|strong="H5921"\w* neighbour’s \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*. \w And|strong="H0376"\w* thou shalt \w take|strong="H3318"\w* \w away|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* thee.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* damsel \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w betrothed|strong="H0781"\w*, \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w taking|strong="H7901"\w* \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w her|strong="H0518"\w*, \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w her|strong="H0518"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w alone|strong="H0905"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*:

\w The|strong="H0834"\w* damsel \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* suffer \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* guilty \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* robber riseth \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* brother, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* taketh \w away|strong="H0369"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w also|strong="H2088"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* damsel suffer:

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* damsel \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* espoused, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w taking|strong="H7901"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w*, \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* matter \w come|strong="H4672"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w judgment|strong="H0834"\w*:
